title: Tech News: Apple Begrudgingly Adopts USB-C for iPhones
itunes:title: Tech News: Apple Begrudgingly Adopts USB-C for iPhones
description:
The EU will require Apple to switch to a USB-C port on iPhones starting in late 2024 and the company isn't happy about it. Plus Elon Musk is on the verge of closing his deal for Twitter, the US Department of Justice is reportedly investigating Tesla and gamers might be shocked to learn that physical copies of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II have no game on the physical disk.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The EU will require Apple to switch to a USB-C port on iPhones starting in late 2024 and the company isn't happy about it. Plus Elon Musk is on the verge of closing his deal for Twitter, the US Department of Justice is reportedly investigating Tesla and gamers might be shocked to learn that physical copies of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II have no game on the physical disk.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Apple, USB-C, Lightning, Alphabet, Google, YouTube, Elon Musk, Twitter, Tesla, SpaceX, Starlink, Meta, Mark Zuckerberg, metaverse, Facebook, advertising, targeted ads, political ads, hacker, New York Post, Fast Company, China, Taiwan, semiconductors, robots, Nvidia, graphics cards
